title: Comcast prepares to top Disney's $50 billion bid for Fox
text:
Comcast prepares to top Disney's $50 billion bid for Fox Wednesday, May 23, 2018 - 01:22
Comcast confirmed for the first time on Wednesday it was preparing a higher, all-cash offer for the businesses that Twenty-First Century Fox has agreed to sell to Walt Disney.
Comcast confirmed for the first time on Wednesday it was preparing a higher, all-cash offer for the businesses that Twenty-First Century Fox has agreed to sell to Walt Disney. //reut.rs/2IDKkBz
